name: flee
content:

C1 to escape by running away, especially because of danger or fear: flee from She fled from the room in tears.flee to In order to escape capture, he fled to the mountains. flee the country
to quickly go to another country in order to escape from something or someone: It is likely that the suspects have fled the country by now.
